reviewText: My 6 year old loves this. Education rap for kids- it doesn't get any better!  Great opportunity for your child to get moving, learn their alphabet, basic mathematics, and so much more!  Its nice to have a character that my kids can relate to and not even realize they are learning while having fun!  And this is a steal of a deal!

My 5 year old loves Rodney Raccoon!  He was so excited to get this!  I can not reccomend this enough!!!  The message that is sent to kids is very positive and in a tune that the kids can associate with.  Kids love to dance and move and rapping Rodney Raccoon gets them to do just that!
